Player History
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $3,100,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Walt Terrell (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1985, off Mike Flanagan (NYG)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1986, hitting .464 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/1987 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 8/13/1987...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 5/22/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1988, hitting .593 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/3/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $11,137,500 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1989, hitting .464 with 0 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/18/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Released by Montreal on 2/20/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $13,921,875 per year...
Injured on 4/29/1990 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/3/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $13,051,758 per year...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
